content: the body do not stuff tail sew the tail to upper rear end of the llama being that the back of the llama is still open this should make it easier to sew the tail on do not attach the tail were we have to close up the back of the llama closing the back of the llama note stuff the body of the llama more firmly as you go cut a new strand of yarn about 20 -25 long so that you have enough to sew and close up the back of the llama start sewing from the neck area to the tail using the mattress stitch ears make 2 alike with new color yarn round 1 make an magic_ring chain 1 doesn t count as a stitch work 4 single_crochet in the ring mark first stitch with stitch marker do not join total of 4 sts round 2 2 single_crochet in first st 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in the last st total 6 sts rounds 3 5 1 single_crochet in each st around total 6 sts note do not stuff ear press bottom round of ear together and place 3 single_crochet through both sides fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing sew ears to head sew the ears to the top of the head try to center it with the eyes about an inch behind the eyes pompom make two pompoms in any color yarn you choose twist the pompoms yarns together attach the twisted yarn around the neck area of the llama by knotting the yarn 2 times fasten_off weave in the ends congratulations you are finished you made it how llama fun is that follow me here youtube https //youtube com/@crochetandcopy ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/crochetandcopy pinterest https //pin it/x5kanby instagram https //www instagram com/invites/contact/ i=1o9z4a0ba9njs&utm_content=mhvk8te @crochet&copy x https //twitter com/crochetandcopy t=fm7hjmbncdwyhbyqvbbnha&s=09 if you need help with this pattern check out my tutorial https //youtu be/hdicjavp6u4 si=wx_pl7x8a9bzlxua
